Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/vanchor

Function
  1. FProperty vanchor(num v)
  2. FProperty vanchor(computedNum cv)
Description vanchor defines vertical alignment. It sets the vertical anchor to v% of the width of the current figure. v should be a value between 0.0 and 1.0. The value of the vertical anchor may also be computed by a callback cv.

Also see BoxModel, Properties/top, vcenter, and Properties/bottom.
